title: Museum of all the my Projects
p:
This section contains all of my old projects that thought me how to program.
They work "properly" only on pc :-)
description: Visit the museum of all my old projects made in the BBJ for fun! (There are a lot of easter egg!)

cards.title: Super Mario Bros 1
cards.p: This is a recreation inspired by Meth Meth Method

cards.title: Anti Ovomaltine
cards.p:
The project that startet with the intent of not allowing the Ovomaltine chocolate bar to ber recorded on screen...
But works especially well with rubik's cubes

cards.title: Colorbox
cards.p: Copy of a phone game that my old classmates were addicted to...

cards.title: Drawing
cards.p:
An application for drawing geometrical shapes, it even kinda almost supports 3D
Instructions are currently missing...

cards.title: Jack lo smilzo
cards.p: The first failed attemp of recreating Terraria
